title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 251.4 - Permit requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 251.4 - Permit requirements

State Regulations

An owner or operator of a facility subject to this Part
must submit an application for a permit or permit modification, as appropriate, pursuant to Part 201 of this Title. As part of the application, an owner or
operator of a facility subject to a specific CO
2
emission limit in Subdivision
251.3
(a) or (b)
of
this Part must specify which form of CO
2
emission limit
the owner or operator will comply with in the permit, either the output-based
limit or the input-based limit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
251.4

Adopted

New

York State Register May 29, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 22, eff. 6/8/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
